org.lightningj.paywall.spring.websocket

Class BaseWebSocketSettledHandler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.spring.websocket.BaseWebSocketSettledHandler<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WebSocketSettledPaymentHandler

    public abstract class BaseWebSocketSettledHandler<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base implement a WebSocket specific implementation when listening for settled event.

    Different implementations can be used depending on payment flow mode.

    The class maintains a map of registered event listeners and cleans up itself after related invoice have expired. Regular usage should unregister itself when disconnecting.

    • Method Detail

      • registerPaymentListener

        public void registerPaymentListener(java.lang.String preImageHash,
                                    long expireDate,
                                    T paymentListener)
                             throws InternalErrorException
        Method to register a payment listener to a related preImageHash and expireDate. Will perform a cleanup of expired listeners when it's ready. Method will only be added if not already registered.
        Parameters:
        preImageHash - the related preImageHash in Base64
        expireDate - the expireDate of the listener, should usually be the invoice expire date.
        paymentListener - the payment listener to register.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal exception occurred registering the payment listener.

      • hasPaymentListener

        public boolean hasPaymentListener(java.lang.String preImageHash)
        Method that returns true if related paymentListener is registered.
        Parameters:
        preImageHash - the related preImageHash in Base64
        Returns:
        true if already registered.

      • unregisterPaymentListener

        public void unregisterPaymentListener(java.lang.String preImageHash)
                               throws InternalErrorException
        Method that unregister the related payment listener and releases all related resources.

        This method won't release data from expireQueue, it will clean itself up automatically over time.

        Parameters:
        preImageHash - the related PreImageHash in base64
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred releasing the payment listener.

      • registerListener

        protected abstract void registerListener(T listener)
                                  throws InternalErrorException
        Abstract method to register in related event handler.
        Parameters:
        listener - the event listener to register, depending on type.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - thrown by underlying event handler.

      • unregisterListener

        protected abstract void unregisterListener(T listener)
                                    throws InternalErrorException
        Abstract method to unregister in related event handler.
        Parameters:
        listener - the event listener to unregister, depending on type.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - thrown by underlying event handler.
